english.segment1: I drank from this cup. 'Til it watered down my soul. I need you so I'll thirst no more
english.segment2: I started down this path such a long long time ago. I need to find my way home
english.segment3: (Chorus). I want to be the one that holds you high. I want to be the one that gives you glory-only
english.segment4: I want to be the one that holds you high. I want to be the one that brings you praise
english.segment5: I'm the king of my desires. I've tried them all a thousand times. I have got to choose between this world and you
english.segment6: It's got a grip I must admit. I can't explain this emptiness. I hurt without you by my side
english.segment8: I've cried to you in my darkest hour. And you brought my soul up from the grave
